alert.note: Alert for Logan (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 10 at 3:58PM MDT until July 10 at 4:45PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Logan County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 445 PM MDT. * At 357 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles northwest of Westplains, or 20 miles south of Kimball, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Westplains around 405 PM MDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
